alert.note: Alert for Harrison (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 06 at 10:16AM CST until January 06 at 10:00PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Wolf River Above Gulfport affecting Harrison County. For the Wolf River...including Landon, Gulfport...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wolf River Above Gulfport. * WHEN...Until late this evening. * IMPACTS...Above 8.0 feet, Bells Ferry Road is flooded. There will be water over the access road just upstream of the bridge and the road will likely be impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CST Friday the stage was 8.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:45 AM CST Friday was 8.7 feet. - Forecast...The river fall below flood stage late this afternoon and continue to drop. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 8.5 feet on 01/14/1992. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lix. Click on the Rivers and Lakes menu for forecasts and observations. The next statement will be issued when updates are needed.
